about_the_game:
Feel like a Viking god with a choice of 6 powerful paint jobs!

  • Freya's Blessing
  • Loki's Cunning
  • Njord's Resilience
  • Odin's Wisdom
  • Thor's Fury
  • Tyr's Wrath

All of these godly themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
detailed_description:
Feel like a Viking god with a choice of 6 powerful paint jobs!

  • Freya's Blessing
  • Loki's Cunning
  • Njord's Resilience
  • Odin's Wisdom
  • Thor's Fury
  • Tyr's Wrath

All of these godly themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
legal_notice: (C) 2012 SCS Software. All brand names, trademarks, registered marks, logos, and symbols on vehicles in the game are property of their rightful owners. Used with kind permission.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 760-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT-class equivalent
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class or better
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible

short_description: Feel like a Viking god with a choice of 6 powerful paint jobs! Freya's Blessing Loki's Cunning Njord's Resilience Odin's Wisdom Thor's Fury Tyr's WrathAll of these godly themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
supported_languages: Inglês, Alemão, Francês, Italiano, Coreano, Espanhol (Espanha), Chinês simplificado, Russo, Japonês, Português (Portugal), Polonês, Dinamarquês, Holandês, Finlandês, Norueguês, Sueco, Húngaro, Tcheco, Romeno, Turco, Português (Brasil), Búlgaro, Grego
